text:
I am getting the following error when I try the same application with 1.4.1_06 
or 1.4.2_03 version. It works fine with 1.4.1_02 version. How do we resolve 
this issue.

Thanks!
Srini

; nested exception is: org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Document root element is 
missing.
